input.sentences: i went to my brother 's graduation yesterday .
he was so happy to be there .
so many people were there graduating .
some of the teachers even gave speeches to all the students .
it was a really great day and i ca n't wait till is is my turn next year !
output.sentences: It was finally here, the day we had been waiting for.
Our son was graduating with honors from Penn State.
We looked on with pride as the graduates made their way one by one to the stage to gather their diplomas.
The mayor was there to give a speech on perseverance.
All the graduates looked on in awe and wonder, young kids ready to take on the world.
